ca.uwaterloo.crysp.otr.crypt.jca

Class JCAAESCTR

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwaterloo.crysp.otr.crypt.AbstractCipher
      • ca.uwaterloo.crysp.otr.crypt.AESCTR
        • ca.uwaterloo.crysp.otr.crypt.jca.JCAAESCTR
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cipher

    public class JCAAESCTR
extends AESCTR
    JCA-specific implementations of AES in Counter Mode. In particular, JCA is used to encrypt the control block that is XORd with the blocks of plaintext/ciphertext. Also manages the symmetric key using JCA's SecretKey class.

    • Field Summary
